SELECT sy.* from es_goods st JOIN es_goods_gallery sy ON st.goods_id = sy.goods_id WHERE st.goods_id=#{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT COUNT(c.comment_id) FROM es_member_comment c LEFT JOIN es_goods g ON c.goods_id = g.goods_id LEFT JOIN u_user m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.type = 1 AND c.status = 1 and g.goods_id = #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC

SELECT e.original, e.img_id, c.goods_id, c.comment_id, c.member_id FROM es_member_comment c LEFT JOIN es_member_comment_gallery e ON c.comment_id=e.comment_id WHERE c.goods_id=#{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT goods_id,name,price , enableStore,tag_name,catname,cat_id,thumbnail FROM ( select g.goods_id,g.name,g.price,g.enable_store enableStore, GROUP_CONCAT(u.tag_name) tag_name ,er.name as catname,er.cat_id ,g.thumbnail from es_goods g LEFT JOIN es_goods_cat er ON g.cat_id = er.cat_id LEFT JOIN es_tag_rel r ON g.goods_id = r.rel_id LEFT JOIN es_tags u ON r.tag_id = u.tag_id LEFT JOIN es_member_comment c ON c.goods_id = g.goods_id WHERE 1=1 AND er.cat_id in ( SELECT cat_id from es_goods_cat where parent_id in( SELECT cat_id from es_goods_cat p WHERE p.parent_id =#{cat_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) ) and g.brand_id=#{brand_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND g.market_enable=1 GROUP BY g.goods_id ORDER BY g.sord asc,g.last_modify DESC )m
ORDER BY price DESC
ORDER BY price ASC
LIMIT #{pageNo},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(1) from es_goods g LEFT JOIN es_goods_cat er ON g.cat_id = er.cat_id LEFT JOIN es_tag_rel r ON g.goods_id = r.rel_id LEFT JOIN es_tags u ON r.tag_id = u.tag_id LEFT JOIN es_member_comment c ON c.goods_id = g.goods_id WHERE 1=1 AND er.cat_id in ( SELECT cat_id from es_goods_cat where parent_id in ( SELECT cat_id from es_goods_cat p WHERE p.parent_id =#{cat_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) ) and g.brand_id=#{brand_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND g.market_enable=1

select s.spec_name name ,GROUP_CONCAT(distinct sv.spec_value) value from es_specification s , es_spec_values sv , es_goods_spec gs where gs.goods_id=#{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gs.spec_id=s.spec_id and gs.spec_value_id = sv.spec_value_id GROUP BY name -- ORDER BY s.spec_type order by gs.product_id desc /*排序顺序与后台添加商品是的规格顺序一致*/

SELECT g.goods_id,y.activity_id,g.name,g.enable_store,g.price,g.mktprice,g.thumbnail,y.start_time *1000 AS start_time,y.end_time*1000 AS end_time, case WHEN (y.start_time <(select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())) and y.end_time >(select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()))) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS state, g.carriage, g.weight, g.mktprice, g.intro, g.reduction, g.credit from es_goods g LEFT JOIN es_activity_goods t ON t.goods_id = g.goods_id LEFT JOIN es_activity y ON y.activity_id = t.activity_id WHERE y.disabled=0 AND ( y.start_time <(select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())) and y.end_time >(select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())) ) ORDER BY state,g.sord asc,g.last_modify desc LIMIT #{pageNo},#{pageSize}

SELECT g.goods_id,y.activity_id,g.name,g.enable_store,g.price,g.thumbnail,y.start_time *1000 AS start_time,y.end_time*1000 AS end_time, case WHEN (y.start_time <(select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())) and y.end_time >(select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()))) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS state, g.carriage, g.weight, g.mktprice, g.intro, g.reduction, g.credit from es_goods g LEFT JOIN es_activity_goods t ON t.goods_id = g.goods_id LEFT JOIN es_activity y ON y.activity_id = t.activity_id WHERE y.disabled=0 AND ( y.start_time <(select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())) and y.end_time >(select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())) and g.goods_id=#{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
